scripts.build:ui: rm -rf ../fsopen-part3/dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../fsopen-part3/dist
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploying to Heroku' && git push heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "Deploying with updated frontend" && git push && git push heroku main
